    • getZone

      @NotNull public @NotNull Collection<Zone> getZone​(@Nullable @Nullable org.spongepowered.api.world.World<?,​?> world, @NotNull @NotNull org.spongepowered.math.vector.Vector3d worldPos)
      Gets the zones that are found at a location within a world. Note that zones can cross one and another such as sub zones being instead a parent zone, therefore it returns a collection
      Parameters:
      world - The world to check
      worldPos - The location to check
      Returns:
      A collection of all the zones found that contain that location

    • getPriorityZone

      @NotNull public @NotNull Optional<Zone> getPriorityZone​(org.spongepowered.api.world.Location<? extends org.spongepowered.api.world.World<?,​?>,​?> loc)
      Gets the zone that should be used with interactions at the provided location, such as using the sub zone rather then the parent
      Parameters:
      loc - The location to compare
      Returns:
      The zone to use. Optional.empty() when no zone was found at the position
